title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inhabitants in millions, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Inhabitants in millions has decreased over the Year
Inhabitants in millions is roughly constant from 2014 to 2024.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Inhabitants in millions about 146.9 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Inhabitants in millions about 145.74 was recorded at Year 2024
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inhabitants in millions, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2024.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
